abstract: JPMorgan Chase will no longer offer independent U.S. tax preparers financing for tax-refund loans, Reuters reported.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase will no longer offer independent U.S. tax preparers financing for tax-refund loans, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase will no longer offer independent American  tax preparers financing for tax-refund loans, a company spokesman said.

headline.main: JPMorgan to Halt Tax-Refund Loans to Paid Preparers
